# Discretization

```@docs
discretize
DiscretizationMethod
FIST
```
# FIST  
Examples for the FIST algorithm. 

### Usage  
  
```@example overview
using Plots; gr(size=(300,300))
using GeoStats
```

Construct a polygon using `PolyArea`:  

```@example overview

plot(poly)
```  
Discretize polygon into triangles using FIST:  
```@example overview
mesh = discretize(poly, FIST())
plot(mesh)
```
